items.title: Jet carrying Gonzaga basketball team nearly collides with Delta plane at LAX—audio captures frantic ‘stop, stop, stop’ from air traffic control
items.description: A plane operated by Key Lime Air nearly collided with a Delta aircraft that was taking off around 4:30 p.m. No one was injured.

items.title: FBI warns crime gangs are stalking NFL and NBA stars on social media—Travis Kelce and Luka Doncic among burglarized
items.description: Organized theft groups from South America use publicly available information and social media to identify athletes' habits and track their comings and...

items.title: California will require home insurers to expand coverage in wildfire-prone areas after top carriers stopped offering new policies
items.description: In exchange for increasing coverage, insurers will be able to consider climate change when setting their prices.

items.title: Treasury Department says a China state-sponsored cyberattack gained access to workstations and documents
items.description: The incident happened earlier this month, when a third-party cybersecurity service provider was compromised.

items.title: Americans are increasingly falling behind on their credit card bills, flashing a warning sign for the economy
items.description: The amount of credit card debt written off through the first three quarters of 2024 reached $45.7 billion, up 46% from the same period a year ago.
